description: Try our easy to follow Christmas Peppermint Brownie Jars recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Christmas Peppermint Brownie Jars Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 225g Nestle Plaistowe Dark Cooking Chocolate, broken into pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Brownies: Preheat oven to 180Â°C (fan-forced) and line a 20cm square deep slice tin with baking paper. In a large bowl, combine margarine, sugars and salt with an electric mixer until smooth.
Add peppermint extract, eggs and egg yolk one at a time, mix on medium speed until batter is pale.
Sift flour, cocoa powder and baking powder into the batter and half of the chocolate pieces.
Stir until just combined, then add the remaining chocolate.
Spoon batter into tin and bake for 40 minutes. Remove from oven and allow to cool.
Creamy vanilla frosting: Beat the margarine with an electric mixer on low until creamy.
Slowly add icing mixture. Once combined, increase to medium speed and add vanilla essence then slowly add cream.
Transfer to a piping bag with medium star nozzle.
Mason jar (to assemble): Divide brownie into 16 squares.
Place 1 brownie piece in each jar, pipe a rosette of frosting and sprinkle with crushed candy cane.
Repeat all layers and close jar with lid. Tie remaining candy canes to outside of jars with twine.
